overview: Ophini Entertainment is an independent film production company dedicated to crafting cinematic experiences that resonate across cultures and generations. Founded on the belief that powerful storytelling can illuminate the human condition, we develop, produce, and distribute narrative-driven films that challenge convention and celebrate the art of cinema.

history.event: Ophini Entertainment founded in London by a collective of filmmakers and producers with a shared vision for bold, auteur-driven cinema.
First short film, 'The Moth Hour,' premieres at the BFI London Film Festival, earning critical acclaim and a nomination for Best British Short.
Production begins on debut feature 'Beneath the Signal,' a psychological thriller that would go on to define the studio's signature tone.
'Beneath the Signal' released to international acclaim. Screenings at Cannes, Toronto, and Sundance. Acquisition by a major distributor.
Slate expands to five concurrent projects. Ophini opens a development office in Los Angeles, cementing its transatlantic presence.

mandate: Our mandate is simple: tell stories that matter, with craft that endures. We are drawn to narratives that explore moral complexity, cultural identity, and the tension between individual conviction and collective pressure. We champion diverse voices, invest in emerging talent, and believe that cinema — at its best — is the most powerful empathy machine ever built.
